## Setup

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(fs)

source(here("R/functions.R"))
options(dplyr.summarise.inform = FALSE)
```

```{r}
user_info_df <- import_multiple_files("user_info.csv", import_user_info)
saliva_df <- import_multiple_files("saliva.csv", import_saliva)
```

```{r}
user_info_df |> select(where(is.character))

saliva_df |> summarise(cortisol_mean = mean(cortisol_norm), melatonin_mean = mean(melatonin_norm))
```

```{r}
saliva_df |> summarise(across(where(is.numeric), list(mean = mean, sd = sd)))
```

```{r}
rr_df <- import_multiple_files("RR.csv", import_rr)
summarised_rr_df <- rr_df |>
  group_by(file_path_id, day) |>
  summarise(across(ibi_s, list(
    mean = \(x) mean(x, na.rm = TRUE),
    sd = \(x) sd(x, na.rm = TRUE)
  ))) |>
  ungroup()
summarised_rr_df
```
